name: Evolved
description: A simple pair of parent and child themes and a set of build tasks to help you start and manage your WordPress theme development process.

name: DxBoston
description: A design conference put on by AIGA Boston to spotlight great experimenters in Boston and beyond.

name: scrollNav
description: A jQuery plugin that auto-populates a scrolling Table of Contents from a page's existing headings.

name: typecards
description: A set of digital flashcards on typography terminology built with html and javascript to mimic a native app experience.
